name: La Montagne Mille
description:
The Montagne Mille is a 2D mountain climber where you platform your way to the top of a freshly formed mountain in Victorian Era. You play as Quentin Black-Hithe legendary mountaineer competing against your arch nemesis Frances Françoise Pierre bon-matte for the honor of your country. Whoever plants their flag on top the mountain first takes the mountain for their country! Will you make it to the top and claim this new mountain for the British empire?

Use arrows to navigate, space to jump, space twice to double jump, e to dash, q to dialogue and escape or p for pause / skip dialogue.

Programming, level design: Potez Potez#1501
Programming: Oktosha oktosha#3763
Music: Adriikko Adriikko#7419
Narrative: mybameisfreddie mybameisfreddie#1525
Art: Siskan Siskan#6386
